Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on Austinburg Road in Ashtabula, Ohio with Route 90 highway visibility.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
For Sale: $875,000
Rare opportunity to own an existing open and operating 18
hole, 6,038 yard golf course in Ashtabula, OH. With total of 145.73 Acres, the driving range across the street from the golf course consists of 23.22 Acres with Route 90 visibility.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: The Property is a classic colonial style home built in 1900. The two-story house located at 1009 Kenilworth Avenue, Cleveland, Ohio 44113 totals 3,498 SF. Offering a first-story commercial unit, and 3 residential units. Multiple updates have accured at the property since it was purchased in 2009.
Opportunity Zone: Located in the W.25th-Metrohealth Opportunity Zone Corridor, take advantage of huge tax savings with this value-add property!

Recent Renovations - 2019 bathroom updates: top front suitesubway tile, modern shower head, glass door, fan, tile flooring, new mirror, faucet & sink. - 2019 fresh paint throughout - top front & top back suites - 2012 bathroom upgrades - top back suite - 2012 kitchen updates: top back suite new modern cabinets, countertops, backsplash, refrigerator.

This unique property is located in Tremont which is one of Cleveland’s oldest neighborhoods with a rich history dating back to the early 1800s. Today the neighborhood is known for its award-winning restaurants, lively art scene, boutique shops, scenic churches, and fun-filled events that bring the community together and attract visitors from around the region and across the country.
OFFERING PRICE: $395,000
PRICE/ SF: $112.92/SF
BUILDING TOTAL AREA: 3,498 SF
BUILDING TOTAL ACERAGE: 0.103 AC

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The properties prime location on Kenilworth Avenue is within walking distance of some of Cleveland’s most popular restaurants, bars, & shops.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property offers the perfect opportunity for an owner-occupant looking to make the ideal Cleveland investment, while able to live in one unit and rent the additional 2 units to cover the mortgage! The property rental units
offer a rent growth opportunity.

- Great owner/user opportunity
